general.about: Hello! I’m a senior user experience designer. I’m curious to understand people and I’m driven to create great products for them. I am especially excited to work on products that allow people to live longer, healthier and happier lives.

projects.heading: Primary Care Physician Search at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
projects.description: As the senior product designer, I led discovery and branding alignment for an external provider directory using NPI data. I also created custom illustrations and collaborated with content and study teams, supporting the launch of a new AIM for the EfFORT project.
projects.title: Primary Care Physician Search

projects.heading: Improving Telemedicine Device Readiness at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
projects.description: Led the enhancement of the telemedicine experience by streamlining the mobile login process and improving support for testing devices. This increased patient preparedness, clinic efficiency, and reduced the burden on Help Desk staff.
projects.title: Improving Telemedicine Device Readiness

projects.heading: Digital Genetic Platform at Memorial Sloan Kettering
projects.description: Co-led the design of MyGene Portal, a tool for the EfFORT Study that facilitates provider-mediated genetic testing outreach. This project, funded by the National Human Genome Research Institute, improves genetic testing accessibility and reduces the burden on patients.
projects.title: Digital Genetic Platform

projects.heading: Physicians Practice Web Design at Physicians Practice Enhancement, LLC
projects.description: Led a comprehensive website redesign, delivering a user-friendly site with a scalable design system. Tailored the site to key audiences, reinforcing the company’s mission of offering flexible healthcare solutions.
projects.title: Physicians Practice Web Design

projects.heading: Medical Supply Company at EdgePark
projects.description: Guided a 90-year-old medical supply company’s evolution to remain relevant and position for future growth.
projects.title: Medical Supply Company

projects.heading: Optimizing Inventory Management for Medical Device Manufacturers at WaveMark
projects.description: As a senior product designer I helped design a product offering that empowers MDMs to better manage inventory and improve customer service, addressing critical industry needs.
projects.title: Optimizing Inventory Management for Medical Device Manufacturers

projects.heading: Contractor Financing App at Rocket Mortgage
projects.description: As an in-house designer at Rocket Loans, I designed a responsive app platform that streamlined the financing process for contractors and homeowners.
projects.title: Contractor Financing App

sideProjects.heading: Law firm Directory at caraccidentattorney.com
sideProjects.description: Designed a modern, premium website for a lawyer directory. Created wireframes for eight pages, high-fidelity mockups in Figma, and a design system for a consistent, responsive experience that conveys authority.
sideProjects.title: Law firm Directory

sideProjects.heading: Amazon Infographics at Bargoose
sideProjects.description: Designed Amazon infographics to boost product visibility and conversions. Created custom icon illustrations and managed a team of 3D artists to produce engaging visuals.
sideProjects.title: Amazon Infographics

sideProjects.heading: Sarita Salsa Brand Logo Design at Sarita Salsa
sideProjects.description: Developed a vibrant logo capturing the essence of Sarita Salsa's bold flavors, effectively communicating energy and culture in a competitive market.
sideProjects.title: Sarita Salsa Brand Logo Design

sideProjects.heading: Australian homeownership fintech at sucasa
sideProjects.description: Implemented Sucasa's new brand across marketing assets, including a PowerPoint template, updated pitch decks, and HTML email templates.
sideProjects.title: Australian homeownership fintech

workExperience.heading: Senior Product Designer at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
workExperience.description: Collaborate cross-functionally to address patient needs in remote settings, such as telemedicine, hospital at home, creating simple, impactful experiences within the Health Consumer Platform.
workExperience.title: Senior Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer / Design Strategist at Cardinal Health
workExperience.description: Work as a member of a sidecar team specializing in breakthrough innovation for complex and highly regulated products, including reducing waste of expired medical devices, loss of specimen samples in independent lab testing facilities.
workExperience.title: Product Designer / Design Strategist

workExperience.heading: UX Designer at Rocket Loans
workExperience.description: Developed design strategies, wireframed key interactions, and created prototypes while adhering to design library guidelines.
workExperience.title: UX Designer

workExperience.heading: Marketing Director / 3D Manager at MR Direct International
workExperience.description: Owning the operational strategy and outlook for the Creative team serving a core business line.
workExperience.title: Marketing Director / 3D Manager

workExperience.heading: UX UI Lead / 3D Manager at MR Direct International
workExperience.description: Created user-friendly designs, managed UX projects, streamlined processes, and balanced business, technical, and customer needs.
workExperience.title: UX UI Lead / 3D Manager

workExperience.heading: Creative Director at MR Direct International
workExperience.description: Guided a multidisciplinary design team and evolved the working model to support business growth.
workExperience.title: Creative Director

education.heading: Bachelor's Degree, Health Innovation & Entrepreneurship at Arizona State University
Digital Media Arts at Olympic College

certifications.name: Facilitating UX Workshops

certifications.name: Essentials of Service Design
